de.romankreisel.LogViewer
Interface MemoryHandlerListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
LogviewPanel
public interface MemoryHandlerListener

Interface allows classes to listen to changes of MemoryHandlers.

Author:
Roman Kreisel

Method Summary
 void logRecordInserted(MemoryHandler memoryHandler, boolean removedOldMessages)
          Fired by MemoryHandler if a new LogRecord was added.
 

Method Detail

logRecordInserted

void logRecordInserted(MemoryHandler memoryHandler,
                       boolean removedOldMessages)
Fired by MemoryHandler if a new LogRecord was added.

Parameters:
memoryHandler - The MemoryHandler firing the event.
removedOldMessages - True if the MemoryHandler has no more space for new records and removed old records.
